properties.entry: SELECT STUDENT_NO, STUDENT_NAME, STUDENT_ADDRESS, DEPARTMENT_NAME FROM TB_STUDENT LEFT JOIN TB_DEPARTMENT USING(DEPARTMENT_NO) ORDER BY STUDENT_NO
SELECT STUDENT_NO, STUDENT_NAME, STUDENT_ADDRESS, DEPARTMENT_NAME FROM TB_STUDENT LEFT JOIN TB_DEPARTMENT USING(DEPARTMENT_NO) WHERE DEPARTMENT_NAME = '건축공학과' ORDER BY STUDENT_NO
SELECT STUDENT_NO, STUDENT_NAME, STUDENT_ADDRESS, DEPARTMENT_NAME FROM TB_STUDENT LEFT JOIN TB_DEPARTMENT USING(DEPARTMENT_NO) WHERE DEPARTMENT_NAME LIKE '%' || ? || '%' ORDER BY STUDENT_NO
